name: Agentforce UI Demo
description: Next.js demo app showcasing a custom UI for a Salesforce Agentforce Agent using the Agent API and Heroku AppLink

SF_AGENT_ID.description: Agentforce Agent ID from Salesforce Setup (starts with 0Xx)

SF_CONSUMER_KEY.description: Connected App Consumer Key (required for direct mode)

SF_CONSUMER_SECRET.description: Connected App Consumer Secret (required for direct mode)

NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_TITLE.description: Title displayed in the application header

NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_DESCRIPTION.value: Your Agentforce agents at your fingertips

NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_INTRO_MESSAGE.description: Welcome message shown to users in the chat interface
